text_block_list.text:
Since the day Winning Ticket ran away from the public training, 
her condition fell visibly.

Most of all, she was in a state of shock. In such a state, the 
Derby was approaching in a few days.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Live broadcasting makes me nervous. I have to make sure I don't 
fail like I did in the “SatsukiShou”.

Today there is a press conference featuring the Horse Girls who 
will be running in the Derby.

Winning Ticket was watching the other Horse Girls on TV waiting 
until she was called.
choice_data_list: Do you have any idea on what to say?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Well… For the time being…

Winning Ticket gave me an unsatisfactory 
reply while staring at the TV.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
“The Derby is full of powerhouses. Please 
tell us about your enthusiasm”

text_block_list.name: Participant Horse Girl
text_block_list.text:
“Of course we are watching every race of our rivals. I think 
there are really talented people here.”

text_block_list.name: Participant Horse Girl
text_block_list.text:
“But I finally got to the big stage once in a lifetime. The only 
thing in my mind is about running through the goal at the top.”

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
She's amazing, she has straight eyes. I'm 
sure these words are her true feelings.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
…Me too “The Derby is a race I've been always longing 
for, so I wanted to make sure to win and become a 
Derby Horse Girl” is what I always thought.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But, that's not my true feelings. Actually, 
I'm afraid to lose, so I can't help it.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, sorry for just nagging. I'm so hopeless…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Everyone is talking about their burning feelings for the Derby, 
but I'm the only one who gets scared…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Even now my legs are stiff, it's like they're not my own legs…
Well, there's no doubt that you're more scared than anyone else.
Well, there's no doubt that you're more scared than anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
…Ahaha, you're right. Even if I go to the 
press conference, I'll be laughed at.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Even if I go to the Derby, I won't win. 
After all, I should already giveー

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Eh… Win…?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
What are you saying!? Trainer-san you admitted it too! That I'm 
more scared than anyone! That I'm the weaker than anyone elseー
That's why you can win!
That's why you can win!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
That's not true! At such an important 
stage you can't win being a wimp…!

I think the reason why you're more afraid than anyone is because 
you have a stronger desire to win the Derby than anyone else.

I think the reason why you're more afraid than anyone is because 
you have a stronger desire to win the Derby than anyone else.

I want to win the Derby more seriously than anyone else, to the 
point where my legs shake so much when thinking about losing.

My teacher also said that. “The strength of your feelings is 
important for the Derby”.

You have accumulated more feelings than anyone else. Since the 
time you saw the Derby when you were little…!

You have accumulated more feelings than anyone else. Since the 
time you saw the Derby when you were little…!

After I said all that to Winning Ticket 
I gave her the “Derby Note”.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah… My notes.

The accumulated feelings will be the power that makes anyone do 
their best in times of hardship! To win, It becomes a power to 
rely on more powerful than anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
You can do better than anyone else… You 
can rely on it more than anyone else…!
And then, put this in the notebookー
choice_data_list: Our names when we win the Derby!
Our names when we win the Derby!

text_block_list.text: And then, put this in the notebookー
choice_data_list: Our names when we win the Derby!
Our names when we win the Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Sob… Derby… I've been longing for you all my life… Derby…!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I want to win! It's been my dream since I was little! I'm scared, 
but I can't give up!! Waaaaaa～～!!!!

Every time I talked about the Derby, 
Winning Ticket would be crying.

Listening to the deep cry echoing in the 
room, I felt that she had returned.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Woah～, I cried a lot! I'm always crying, but I may have cried in 
a special way today, ehehe.
Did you decide what to say at the press conference?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I'm afraid to lose, but I'll say “I'll do my best” 
just like that! After all, I have an ally called 
feelings that I have accumulated!
choice_data_list: You'll have to convey that feeling to everyone
You'll have to convey that feeling to everyone

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! Alright, I'm going to put my 
energy into it! Der～～, by～～～～!!!!
(Knock-Knock)

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Excuse me. Winning Ticket-san, your turn is almost up.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yes! Thanks for having me!
And, at that timeーA familiar name came out of the TV.

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text: “Next up is Narita Taishin-san”

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's Taishin! Tazuna-san, just a 
little! Can we stay just a little!?

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Well, if it's just a little…

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
Taishin-san, it seems that your hard training continues. After 
all, Even if you won the “SatsukiShou” you have to be mindful.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Of course. The opponents who lost the “SatsukiShou” 
won't stay silent like this. I don't mind, because 
I don't plan to pull any punches.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Even in the Derby, I'm going to show my back to my rivals.
Taishin will be your strongest competitor this time as well.
Taishin will be your strongest competitor this time as well.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, but this time I'll show her my back!

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text: “Next up is Biwa Hayahide-san”

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hayahide…! Tazuna-san! Just a little more!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Heh～!? But your press conference is 
right after Biwa Hayahide-san!

If it's a Horse Girls legs, she will arrive at the room that is 
broadcasting in mere seconds!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Wait, Trainer-san you too!? Even though it's live!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There are a few rivals that have reached the Derby with me.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
If my rival went up 1 step ahead, I could try to go 2 steps 
ahead. So we came up to this stage with each other's effort.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But, getting on the stage is not the goal. My goal is to run and 
win against my rivals.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, let's run Hayahide!
choice_data_list: Let's catch up with the 2 of them and overtake them!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I'll run with all my might! To make 
our Derby the most fantastic Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Now that's decided, I have to start moving now! Tazuna-san, I'm 
sorry! I'll pass the press conference!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Heh～!? Wait, Winning Ticket-san!?

I'm sorry, we don't have enough time 
to get to 100& performance anymore.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Geez, even if you suddenly say such a thing～!!
Thus, for the Derby, Winning Ticket started running again.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaaaaaaaaa～～!! More faster!! More-more!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
This girl, when I thought she wouldn't come to the press 
conference so she was running.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: … Or rather, why are you running in your uniform?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, that's the kind of girl she is. When it comes to the Derby 
she will rush everything.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I will definitely win～～!! Deeeeeeeeeerbyyyyyyyyyyy!

Her feelings for the Derby was the sound of 
her footsteps running through the course.
